# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Volume_plot)

ADD_PLOT_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Volume)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
VolumePluginInfo.C
VolumeCommonPluginInfo.C
VolumeAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
VolumePluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
VolumeGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisVolumePlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
VolumeViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
VolumeViewerPluginInfo.C
avtVolumePlot.C
VolumeFunctions.C
VolumeRLEFunctions.C
avtVolumeRenderer.C
avtVolumeFilter.C
avtLowerResolutionVolumeFilter.C
avtDefaultRenderer.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
VolumeViewerEnginePluginInfo.C
VolumeEnginePluginInfo.C
avtVolumePlot.C
VolumeFunctions.C
VolumeRLEFunctions.C
avtVolumeRenderer.C
avtVolumeFilter.C
avtLowerResolutionVolumeFilter.C
avtDefaultRenderer.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_PLOT_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Abstract
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/General
)

if(VISIT_OSPRAY)
    include_directories(${OSPRAY_INCLUDE_DIR})
endif()

if(VISIT_SLIVR)
    add_definitions(-DVISIT_SLIVR)
endif()

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IVolumePlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVolumePlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVolumePlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GVolumePlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    set_target_properties(GVolumePlot PROPERTIES AUTOMOC ON)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GVolumePlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VVolumePlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(VVolumePlot VIEWER)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VVolumePlot visitcommon viewer vtkRenderingVolume vtkRenderingVolumeOpenGL2 )
    if(VISIT_OSPRAY)
        target_link_libraries(VVolumePlot ${OSPRAY_LIBRARIES})
    endif()


    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GVolumePlot VVolumePlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            VolumeScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyVolumeAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SVolumePlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        IF(WIN32)
            # This prevents python from #defining snprintf as _snprintf
            SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(SVolumePlot PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS HAVE_SNPRINTF)
        ENDIF()
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SVolumePlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SVolumePlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        FILE(COPY VolumeAttributes.java DESTINATION ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR}/src/plots)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaVolume ALL ${Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE} ${VISIT_Java_FLAGS} -d ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -classpath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} -sourcepath ${JavaClient_BINARY_DIR} VolumeAttributes.java
            DEPENDS JavaClient
            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVolumePlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVolumePlot_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtplotter_ser avtexpressions_ser vtkRenderingVolume vtkRenderingVolumeOpenGL2 )
if(VISIT_OSPRAY)
    target_link_libraries(EVolumePlot_ser ${OSPRAY_LIBRARIES})
endif()

ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVolumePlot_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVolumePlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVolumePlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVolumePlot_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtplotter_par avtexpressions_par vtkRenderingVolume vtkRenderingVolumeOpenGL2 )
    if(VISIT_OSPRAY)
        target_link_libraries(EVolumePlot_par ${OSPRAY_LIBRARIES})
    endif()

    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVolumePlot_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVolumePlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(plots ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(plots Volume ${INSTALLTARGETS})
